text: Patrick Poivey (18 February 1948 - 16 June 2020) was a French actor. He was known for being a voice actor, having dubbed Bruce Willis's movies from 1988 until his death. He was born in Paris. His best known non-dubbing roles were in Loulou (1980) and in Mune: Guardian of the Moon (2014). Poivey died on 16 June 2020 from a stroke in Paris, aged 72.Patrick Poivey, voix fran√ßaise de Bruce Willis, est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:French stage actors Category:Actors from Paris
